responsibilities: Architect, develop and manage a scalable, reliable, optimized infrastructure to train, test, and improve Automatic Speech Recognition, Computer Vision, and Natural Language Understanding models.
Deliver novel, strategic solutions to improve the fairness, security, and innovation of Axon models.
Influence the AI community by developing state-of-the-art solutions for responsible AI.
Collaborate closely with scientists and engineers to enable new AI capabilities for Axon products.
Support the training, evaluation, testing, and deployment of machine learning models.
qualifications: Familiarity with ML frameworks such as TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch.
Advanced knowledge and hands-on experience with at least one cloud environment (e.g., AWS, Microsoft Azure, Oracle, or Google Cloud).
Excellent problem-solving and software design skills.
Comfort communicating and interacting with scientists, engineers, and ML/product managers.
analysis: The job responsibilities include developing and managing infrastructure for training and improving models related to Automatic Speech Recognition, Computer Vision, and Natural Language Understanding. While these areas are related to AI, they do not specifically mention Generative AI or language models (LLMs). The focus seems to be on broader AI capabilities and responsible AI solutions. The skills required include proficiency in Python, familiarity with ML frameworks, and experience with cloud environments, which are common in AI and ML roles but do not specifically indicate work with GenAI or LLMs. There is no explicit mention of tasks or skills directly related to Generative AI or language models.
